com.adobe.cq.social.commons.ugclimiter.api

Interface UGCLimiterService


  • public interface UGCLimiterService
    A service to throttle UGC creation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getUgcDuration()
      Gets the ugc duration for ugc rate limit in minutes.
      int getUgcLimit()
      Gets the ugc rate limit.
      java.lang.String[] getUgcLimitedToList()
      Gets the to List to which a user can send mail to request for exception in ugc limit.
      boolean mayCreateUGC(ResourceResolver resolver, java.lang.String userId)
      Check if a user can create any more UGC if UGC Limits is enabled for the user.
      boolean mayCreateUGC(ResourceResolver resolver, User user)
      Check if a user can create any more UGC if UGC Limits is enabled for the user.

    • Method Detail

      • mayCreateUGC

        boolean mayCreateUGC(ResourceResolver resolver,
                     User user)
        Check if a user can create any more UGC if UGC Limits is enabled for the user.
        Parameters:
        resolver - used for reading previously stored ugc limits data
        user - the user to check
        Returns:
        true if user can create more UGC or has no UGC limits.

      • mayCreateUGC

        boolean mayCreateUGC(ResourceResolver resolver,
                     java.lang.String userId)
        Check if a user can create any more UGC if UGC Limits is enabled for the user.
        Parameters:
        resolver - used for reading previously stored ugc limits data
        userId - the userid to check
        Returns:
        true if user can create more UGC or has no UGC limits.

      • getUgcLimit

        int getUgcLimit()
        Gets the ugc rate limit.
        Returns:
        the ugc limit

      • getUgcDuration

        long getUgcDuration()
        Gets the ugc duration for ugc rate limit in minutes. 0 means the time never expires.
        Returns:
        the ugc duration

      • getUgcLimitedToList

        java.lang.String[] getUgcLimitedToList()
        Gets the to List to which a user can send mail to request for exception in ugc limit.
        Returns:
        the array containing one or more moderator mails
